name: PocketQuest II: Beta Gold
description:
This early preview is a work in progress sequel to  PocketQuest. It was made during the PIGSquad 9th Anniversary STAY AT HOME jam.  Instead of using RPGMaker, this time Unity is the engine behind this game.

How to Play Overworld
  • Action/Interact/Dialog Progress: Ctrl Button
  • Movement: Arrow Keys
Battle
  • Action Select: Mouse Click
The Team
  • Brian Cain - Programming and Design, Dialog
  • Casey Frantum: Music and Sound Effects, Story/Dialog
  • Cory Buckley: Box and Title Screen Art and Animation
  • Will Lewis: Monster Art and Design

If you'd like to check out PocketQuest 1, you can find that over on its own itch page!

  • https://briancain.itch.io/pocketquest
